root.name: task
root.tip: Run a task defined in the configuration file.

options.name: --cwd
tip: Specify the directory to run the task in.

options.name: --seed
options.tip: Set the random number generator seed.

options.name: --watch
options.tip: Watch for file changes and restart automatically.

options.name: --fail-fast
options.tip: Stop after N errors. Defaults to stopping after first failure.

options.name: --filter
options.tip: Run tests with this string or pattern in the test name.

options.name: --shuffle
options.tip: Shuffle the order in which the tests are run.

options.name: --coverage
options.tip: Collect coverage profile data into DIR.

options.name: --junit-path
options.tip: Write a JUnit XML test report to PATH. Use '-' to write to stdout which is the default when PATH is not provided.

options.name: --reporter
options.tip: Select reporter to use. Default to 'pretty'.

options.name: --no-config
options.tip: Disable automatic loading of the configuration file.

options.name: --no-lock
options.tip: Disable auto discovery of the lock file.

options.name: --no-prompt
options.tip: Always throw if required permission wasn't passed.

options.name: --cached-only
options.tip: Require that remote dependencies are already cached.

options.name: --no-run
options.tip: Cache test modules, but don''t run tests.

options.name: --trace-ops
options.tip: Enable tracing of async ops. Useful when debugging leaking ops in test, but impacts test execution time.

options.name: --doc
options.tip: Type-check code blocks in JSDoc and Markdown.

options.name: --allow-none
options.tip: Don''t return error code if no test files are found.

options.name: --parallel
options.tip: Run test modules in parallel. Parallelism defaults to the number of available CPUs or the value in the DENO_JOBS environment variable.

options.name: --no-clear-screen
options.tip: Do not clear terminal screen when under watch mode.

options.name: --enable-testing-features-do-not-use
options.tip: INTERNAL: Enable internal features used during integration testing.

options.name: --unsafely-ignore-certificate-errors
options.tip: DANGER: Disables verification of TLS certificates.

root.name: upgrade
root.tip: Upgrade deno executable to given version.

options.name: --output
options.tip: The path to output the updated version to.

options.name: --dry-run
options.tip: Perform all checks without replacing old exe.

options.name: --force
tip: Replace current exe even if not out-of-date.

root.name: vendor
root.tip: Vendor remote modules into a local directory.

options.name: --output
tip: The directory to output the vendored modules to.

options.name: --force
tip: Forcefully overwrite conflicting files in existing output directory.

options.name: --no-config
options.tip: Disable automatic loading of the configuration file.

root.name: help
root.tip: Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s).

completion_info.description: Deno - A secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript.

info.__node_modules_dir: Enables or disables the use of a local node_modules folder for npm packages.
info.__deno_modules_dir: UNSTABLE: Enables or disables the use of a local deno_modules folder for remote modules.
__lock: If value is not provided, defaults to "deno.lock" in the current working directory.
info.__cert: Load certificate authority from PEM encoded file.
__allow_net: Optionally specify allowed IP addresses and host names, with ports as necessary.
__deny_net: Optionally specify denied IP addresses and host names, with ports as necessary.
__allow_env: Allow access to system environment information.
__deny_env: Deny access to system environment information.
__allow_sys: Optionally allow specific APIs by function name.
__deny_sys: Optionally deny specific APIs by function name.
__allow_run: Optionally specify allowed runnable program names.
__deny_run: Optionally specify denied runnable program names.
__allow_ffi: Optionally specify allowed directories or files.
__deny_ffi: Optionally specify denied directories or files.
__allow_hrtime: Note: this can enable timing attacks and fingerprinting.
__deny_hrtime: Note: this can prevent timing attacks and fingerprinting.
info.__inspect_brk: Activate inspector on host:port, wait for debugger to connect and break at the start of user script.
info.__inspect_wait: Activate inspector on host:port and wait for debugger to connect before running user code.
info.__location: Value of 'globalThis.location' used by some web APIs.
